zoneanimation

Class ZoneDAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • zoneanimation.ZoneDAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ZoneDAnimation
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable
    classe qui permet le dessin de plusieurs éléments graphiques ainsi que leurs animation
    Author:
    léo-paul lapointe, Andy Lam
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
